code: import axios from'axios';let activities;const ActivitiesService={getActivities:async function(){const activitiesUrl="".concat(process.env.REACT_APP_STARDUST_BASE_URL).concat(process.env.REACT_APP_STARDUST_WP_API,"/activities?per_page=25");await axios.get(activitiesUrl).then(response=>{activities=response.data;});return activities;}};export default ActivitiesService;
